args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump is an insult to Kamala Harris. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: Believers for Trump
As Christians, we are called to be a light in the darkness. The leadership coming from Washington is in a dark place. Under the Harris administration, free speech and religious liberty are under threat—parents at school board meetings labeled as domestic terrorists, children removed from families over gender reassignment objections, and legislation supporting abortion up to birth. Trump and Vance stand for protecting your First Amendment rights, empowering you to practice your faith freely and raise your children with the values you hold dear.
